data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Istarska, Croatia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Istarska, Croatia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Istarska to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Istarska, Croatia with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Istarska, Croatia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Istarska, Croatia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 885 believers in Istarska to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.section_summary:
the state of Istarska, Croatia has a population of 210,000.

We estimate Istarska has 885 people who might know Jesus, 192,981 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 16,134 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 237 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 885 believers in Istarska to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.
